name: SoldierTalk
_source: s;SoldierBlue;The shrine's as beautiful as ma always said...
s;Simon;This is Atropos' shrine, correct?{w} It's... crowded.
s;SoldierBlue;Yes sir. Warriors from across Troy gather here to worship her.
s;Simon;And she gives them her blessing?
s;SoldierBlue;Rarely, but sometimes. Atropos writes the narrative of history, milord.|I mean, in battle, everyone wants to be the hero, right?
